verses.verse: And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

"You know <S%G3609><s%> that after <S%G3326><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> is coming, <S%G1096><s%> and the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is [to be] delivered <S%G3860><s%> up for crucifixion. <S%G4717><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together <S%G4863><s%> in the court <S%G833><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> named <S%G3004><s%> Caiaphas; <S%G2533><s%>
and they plotted <S%G4823><s%> together <S%G4823><s%> to seize <S%G2902><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by stealth, <S%G1388><s%> and kill <S%G615><s%> [Him.]

But they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Not during <S%G1722><s%> the festival, <S%G1859><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> a riot <S%G2351><s%> occur <S%G1096><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the people. <S%G2992><s%>"

a woman <S%G1135><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him with an alabaster <S%G211><s%> vial <S%G211><s%> of very <S%G927><s%> costly <S%G927><s%> perfume, <S%G3464><s%> and she poured <S%G2708><s%> it upon His head <S%G2776><s%> as He reclined <S%G345><s%> [at the table.]
But the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were indignant <S%G23><s%> when they saw <S%G3708><s%> [this, <S%G3778><s%>] and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Why <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5101><s%> this waste <S%G684><s%>?
"For this <S%G3778><s%> [perfume] might <S%G1410><s%> have been sold <S%G4097><s%> for a high <S%G4183><s%> price <S%G4183><s%> and [the money] given <S%G1325><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%>"

But Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> aware <S%G1097><s%> of this, said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you bother <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3930><s%> the woman <S%G1135><s%>? For she has done <S%G2038><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> deed <S%G2041><s%> to Me.
"For the poor <S%G4434><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> with you always; <S%G3842><s%> but you do not always <S%G3842><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> Me.
"For when she poured <S%G906><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> perfume <S%G3464><s%> upon My body, <S%G4983><s%> she did <S%G4160><s%> it to prepare <S%G1779><s%> Me for burial. <S%G1779><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> is preached <S%G2784><s%> in the whole <S%G3650><s%> world, <S%G2889><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> woman <S%G3778><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> be spoken <S%G2980><s%> of in memory <S%G3422><s%> of her."
Then <S%G5119><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> named <S%G3004><s%> Judas <S%G2455><s%> Iscariot, <S%G2469><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%>

and said, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> are you willing <S%G2309><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> me to deliver <S%G3860><s%> Him up to you?" And they weighed <S%G2476><s%> out to him thirty <S%G5144><s%> pieces <S%G694><s%> of silver. <S%G694><s%>
And from then <S%G5119><s%> on he [began] looking <S%G2212><s%> for a good <S%G2120><s%> opportunity <S%G2120><s%> to betray <S%G3860><s%> Him.

Now <S%G1161><s%> on the first <S%G4413><s%> [day] of Unleavened <S%G106><s%> Bread the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4226><s%> do You want <S%G2309><s%> us to prepare <S%G2090><s%> for You to eat <S%G2068><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%>?"

And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Go <S%G5217><s%> into the city <S%G4172><s%> to a certain <S%G1170><s%> man, <S%G1170><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'The Teacher <S%G1320><s%> says, <S%G3004><s%> "My time <S%G2540><s%> is at hand; <S%G1451><s%> I [am to] keep <S%G4160><s%> the Passover <S%G3957><s%> at your house with My disciples. <S%G3101><s%> "'"
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had directed <S%G4929><s%> them; and they prepared <S%G2090><s%> the Passover. <S%G3957><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> when evening <S%G3798><s%> had come, <S%G1096><s%> He was reclining <S%G345><s%> [at the table] with the twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
And as they were eating, <S%G2068><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that one <S%G1520><s%> of you will betray <S%G3860><s%> Me."
And being deeply <S%G4970><s%> grieved, <S%G3076><s%> they each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Surely <S%G3385><s%> not I, Lord <S%G2962><s%>?"
And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "He who dipped <S%G1686><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%> with Me in the bowl <S%G5165><s%> is the one <S%G3778><s%> who will betray <S%G3860><s%> Me.

"The Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> [is to] go, <S%G5217><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as it is written <S%G1125><s%> of Him; but woe <S%G3759><s%> to that man <S%G444><s%> by whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is betrayed! <S%G3860><s%> It would have been <S%G1510><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> for that man <S%G444><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> he had not been born. <S%G1080><s%>"

And Judas, <S%G2455><s%> who was betraying <S%G3860><s%> Him, answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Surely <S%G3385><s%> it is not I, Rabbi <S%G4461><s%>?" He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "You have said <S%G3004><s%> [it] yourself. <S%G4771><s%>"

And while they were eating, <S%G2068><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> [some] bread, <S%G740><s%> and after a blessing, <S%G2127><s%> He broke <S%G2806><s%> [it] and gave <S%G1325><s%> [it] to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Take, <S%G2983><s%> eat; <S%G2068><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is My body. <S%G4983><s%>"

And when He had taken <S%G2983><s%> a cup <S%G4221><s%> and given <S%G1325><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> He gave <S%G1325><s%> [it] to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Drink <S%G4095><s%> from it, all <S%G3956><s%> of you;
for this <S%G3778><s%> is My blood <S%G129><s%> of the covenant, <S%G1242><s%> which is poured <S%G7062><s%> out for many <S%G4183><s%> for forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

"But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I will not drink <S%G4095><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> fruit <S%G7032><s%> of the vine <S%G288><s%> from now <S%G737><s%> on until <S%G2193><s%> that day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I drink <S%G4095><s%> it new <S%G2537><s%> with you in My Father's kingdom. <S%G932><s%>"
And after singing <S%G5214><s%> a hymn, <S%G5214><s%> they went <S%G1831><s%> out to the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives. <S%G1636><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, " You will all <S%G3956><s%> fall <S%G4624><s%> away <S%G4624><s%> because <S%G1722><s%> of Me this <S%G3778><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'I will strike <S%G3960><s%> down <S%G3960><s%> the shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> of the flock <S%G4167><s%> shall be scattered. <S%G1287><s%>'
"But after <S%G3326><s%> I have been raised, <S%G1453><s%> I will go <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you to Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>"

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, ["Even] though <S%G1487><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> may fall <S%G4624><s%> away <S%G4624><s%> because <S%G1722><s%> of You, I will never <S%G3763><s%> fall <S%G4624><s%> away. <S%G4624><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to him, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that this <S%G3778><s%> [very] night, <S%G3571><s%> before <S%G4250><s%> a cock <S%G220><s%> crows, <S%G5455><s%> you shall deny <S%G533><s%> Me three <S%G5151><s%> times. <S%G5151><s%>"

Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Even <S%G2579><s%> if <S%G2579><s%> I have <S%G1163><s%> to die <S%G599><s%> with You, I will not deny <S%G533><s%> You." All <S%G3956><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the same <S%G3668><s%> thing <S%G3668><s%> too. <S%G2532><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> with them to a place <S%G5564><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Gethsemane, <S%G1068><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "Sit <S%G2523><s%> here <S%G847><s%> while <S%G2193><s%> I go <S%G565><s%> over <S%G565><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> and pray. <S%G4336><s%>"

And He took <S%G3880><s%> with Him Peter <S%G4074><s%> and the two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to be grieved <S%G3076><s%> and distressed. <S%G85><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "My soul <S%G5590><s%> is deeply <S%G4036><s%> grieved, <S%G4036><s%> to the point <S%G2193><s%> of death; <S%G2288><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> and keep <S%G1127><s%> watch <S%G1127><s%> with Me."

And He went <S%G4281><s%> a little <S%G3398><s%> beyond <S%G4281><s%> [them,] and fell <S%G4098><s%> on His face <S%G4383><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "My Father, <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it is possible, <S%G1415><s%> let this <S%G3778><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> pass <S%G3928><s%> from Me; yet <S%G4133><s%> not as I will, <S%G2309><s%> but as Thou wilt."

And He came <S%G2064><s%> to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> "So, <S%G3779><s%> you [men] could <S%G2480><s%> not keep <S%G1127><s%> watch <S%G1127><s%> with Me for one <S%G1520><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%>?

"Keep <S%G1127><s%> watching <S%G1127><s%> and praying, <S%G4336><s%> that you may not enter <S%G1525><s%> into temptation; <S%G3986><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> is willing, <S%G4289><s%> but the flesh <S%G4561><s%> is weak. <S%G772><s%>"

He went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> a second <S%G1208><s%> time <S%G1208><s%> and prayed, <S%G4336><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "My Father, <S%G3962><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> pass <S%G3928><s%> away <S%G3928><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> I drink <S%G4095><s%> it, Thy will <S%G2307><s%> be done. <S%G1096><s%>"
And again <S%G3825><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> them sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> for their eyes <S%G3788><s%> were heavy. <S%G916><s%>

And He left <S%G863><s%> them again, <S%G3825><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> and prayed <S%G4336><s%> a third <S%G5154><s%> time, <S%G5154><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> thing <S%G3056><s%> once <S%G3825><s%> more. <S%G3825><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Are you still <S%G3062><s%> sleeping <S%G2518><s%> and taking <S%G373><s%> your rest <S%G373><s%>? Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%> and the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> is being betrayed <S%G3860><s%> into the hands <S%G5495><s%> of sinners. <S%G268><s%>
"Arise, <S%G1453><s%> let us be going; <S%G71><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the one who betrays <S%G3860><s%> Me is at hand! <S%G1448><s%>"

And while He was still <S%G2089><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> Judas, <S%G2455><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of the twelve, <S%G1427><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> up, accompanied <S%G3326><s%> <S%G846><s%> by a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> with swords <S%G3162><s%> and clubs, <S%G3586><s%> from the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people. <S%G2992><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> he who was betraying <S%G3860><s%> Him gave <S%G1325><s%> them a sign, <S%G4592><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Whomever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> I shall kiss, <S%G5368><s%> He is the one; seize <S%G2902><s%> Him."
And immediately <S%G2112><s%> he went <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Hail, <S%G5463><s%> Rabbi! <S%G4461><s%>" and kissed <S%G2705><s%> Him.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Friend, <S%G2083><s%> [do] what <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G3918><s%> come <S%G3918><s%> for." Then <S%G5119><s%> they came <S%G4334><s%> and laid <S%G1911><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> on Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and seized <S%G2902><s%> Him.

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> were with Jesus <S%G2424><s%> reached <S%G1614><s%> and drew <S%G645><s%> out his sword, <S%G3162><s%> and struck <S%G3960><s%> the slave <S%G1401><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and cut <S%G851><s%> off <S%G851><s%> his ear. <S%G5621><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Put <S%G654><s%> your sword <S%G3162><s%> back <S%G654><s%> into its place; <S%G5117><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who take <S%G2983><s%> up the sword <S%G3162><s%> shall perish <S%G622><s%> by the sword. <S%G3162><s%>

"Or <S%G2228><s%> do you think <S%G1380><s%> that I cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> appeal <S%G3870><s%> to My Father, <S%G3962><s%> and He will at once <S%G737><s%> put <S%G3936><s%> at My disposal <S%G3936><s%> more <S%G4183><s%> than twelve <S%G1427><s%> legions <S%G3003><s%> of angels <S%G32><s%>?
"How <S%G4459><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> shall the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> that it must <S%G1163><s%> happen <S%G1096><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> way <S%G3779><s%>?"

At that time <S%G5610><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> "Have you come <S%G1831><s%> out with swords <S%G3162><s%> and clubs <S%G3586><s%> to arrest <S%G4815><s%> Me as against <S%G1909><s%> a robber <S%G3027><s%>? Every <S%G2596><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> I used to sit <S%G2516><s%> in the temple <S%G2413><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> and you did not seize <S%G2902><s%> Me.

"But all <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> has taken <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> that the Scriptures <S%G1124><s%> of the prophets <S%G4396><s%> may be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>" Then <S%G5119><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> left <S%G863><s%> Him and fled. <S%G5343><s%>

And those <S%G3588><s%> who had seized <S%G2902><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> led <S%G520><s%> Him away <S%G520><s%> to Caiaphas, <S%G2533><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and the elders <S%G4245><s%> were gathered <S%G4863><s%> together. <S%G4863><s%>

But Peter <S%G4074><s%> also was following <S%G190><s%> Him at a distance <S%G3113><s%> as far <S%G2193><s%> as the courtyard <S%G833><s%> of the high <S%G749><s%> priest, <S%G749><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> in, and sat <S%G2521><s%> down <S%G2521><s%> with the officers <S%G5257><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> the outcome. <S%G5056><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the whole <S%G3650><s%> Council <S%G4892><s%> kept trying <S%G2212><s%> to obtain <S%G2212><s%> false <S%G5577><s%> testimony <S%G5577><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> in order <S%G3704><s%> that they might put <S%G2289><s%> Him to death; <S%G2289><s%>
